e: 例⃝「`飲水思源~，`什麼~`時候~`都~`不能~`忘~`了~`父母~`的~`養育~`之~`恩~」。

Deutsch: Gedenke der Quellen, wenn Du trinkst  (Sprichw)
English: lit. when you drink water, think of its source (idiom); gratitude for blessings and their well-spring
Don't forget where your happiness come from.
Be grateful for all your blessings!
